Groups.Name: Main
Groups.DisplayName: Shut Up Sonic Add-On Sound Options

Elements.Name: IncludeDir0
Description: Choose the sound preset of your liking.

Elements.Name: IncludeDir1
Description:
Allows you to which Boost Filter you wish to play during Cyber Space. Choose either the vanilla boost filter or one that mimics the filters to sound like they're from Sonic Generations.

All changes are still applied no matter what option you chose.
Improving the vanilla sounds with higher quality ones and adds little tweaks to it.
Replaces the modified Frontiers SFX with sounds from the Boost Era (Unleashed, Colors, Generations and Lost World)
Replaces the modified Frontiers SFX with sounds from the Dreamcast Era (Adventure 1, 2 and Heroes)
Merges sounds from each Preset into one!
Enable the Cyber Space OST edits.
Makes the Cyber Space stages' boost filters sound akin to that from Sonic Generations.
